data.name: Пусть Горит Электронная Школа
data.description: В разработке! Тёмная полупрозрачная тема для Электронной Школы НСО с огнём на заднем плане.

data.name: YouTube One UI
data.description:
Samsung Fanboy, or you want to use YouTube easier? This theme's for you. Get a glimpse of the S10 on your YouTube with full One UI theme, & makes it easier to navigate the video site.
You can use the SamsungOne font if you want

Features:
- One UI full theme
- Dark Mode Support
- You can use Font Changer with Google Fonts if you want to use the SamsungOne font
- Redesigned sidebar (left)

Enjoy!

data.name: lenta.ru Dark Theme
data.description:
Темная версия Лента.ру без рекламы и лишних блоков, плюс центровка.
Обновляемый и постоянно дорабатываемый дизайн, работающая даже с комментариями сайта. Крч, то, что вам нужно.

data.name: Google Fortnite Style
data.description: This is a Fortnite Style for Google. You can also use any custom background you'd like. Important: If you're having issues updating this style first uninstall it, then reload the page and install it again after selecting your settings. I highly recommend using Stylus over Stylish for both Firefox and Chrome and other supported browsers, mainly because that is what i use for my browsers when i create these styles. Here's a link to the add-on: Stylus for Firefox Stylus for Chrome If you have any issues, questions or feedback, you can contact me here Adam-J-Frost@outlook.com. If you would like to help me out, you can donate to me here: Donate via Ko-fi. I hope you like this style and thank you for using it!

user.name: AdamJFrost
user.about: I like making styles for sites i use. I try to keep them up-to-date as much as i can. If you would like to donate and help me out you can use this link to Donate via Ko-fi. Thanks for using my styles and Thanks if you Donated!

data.name: Godot Docs Wide
data.description: Tiny tweak that makes Godot use the full width of the browser. Can be used with other themes.

data.name: AO3 Night on Reversi
data.description: An edited version of Dark/Night Archive of Our Own for my own specifications and altered while overlaying the built-in Reversi Site Skin. (Honestly, I'm sharing it so I can move it to another computer I use.) Alterations include work text filling the screen, some button skinning (so they aren't flat), and colored links for previously viewed works.

data.name: Google Minimizer
data.description: Reformat various google domains to make them more minimal

data.name: eldarya wardrobe size change
data.description: new wardrobe is less messy than old one but i still decided to resize some items

data.name: Old mofid online
data.description: Better font experience for old MofidOnline website
